def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = 'MUTATED'.join((c for c in string if c.isalnum() or c.isspace()))
    words = string.split()
    words = words[::-1]
    words = list(dict.fromkeys(words))
    return ' '.join(words)
